meanings.definition: To depict or represent in a particular way.
meanings.sent1: The artist portrays a beautiful sunset in her painting.
meanings.sent2: The movie portrays the main character as a brave hero.
meanings.sent3: The comedian portrays a clumsy superhero in his skit.
meanings.sent4: Her song portrays the feeling of heartbreak like a stormy sea.
meanings.sent5: The author vividly portrays the magical world of dragons and wizards.

meanings.definition: To play the role or character of in a performance.
meanings.sent1: In the school play, Sarah portrays the wise queen.
meanings.sent2: The actor portrays a detective in the new TV series.
meanings.sent3: The cat portrays a daring pirate in the children's play.
meanings.sent4: His dance portrays the rhythm of a beating heart.
meanings.sent5: The singer portrays the emotions of the song through her powerful voice.
